channel.title: CVE Feed for wpclever -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpclever -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-6494|2024-07-10T20:29:11.672Z -- wpclever -- wpc%20smart%20quick%20view%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The WPC Smart Quick View for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via admin settings in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with administrator-level permissions and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page. This only affects multi-site installations and installations where unfiltered_html has been disabled.

item.title: CVE-2024-2838|2024-04-27T03:33:35.892Z -- wpclever -- wpc%20composite%20products%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The WPC Composite Products for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'wooco_components[0][name]' parameter in all versions up to, and including, 7.2.7 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping and missing authorization on the ajax_save_components function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-30537|2024-06-10T18:40:32.830Z -- wpclever -- wpc%20badge%20management%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WPClever WPC Badge Management for WooCommerce.This issue affects WPC Badge Management for WooCommerce: from n/a through 2.4.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-32520|2024-04-17T07:33:02.858Z -- wpclever -- wpc%20grouped%20product%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WPClever WPC Grouped Product for WooCommerce.This issue affects WPC Grouped Product for WooCommerce: from n/a through 4.4.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-32687|2024-06-04T17:51:54.645Z -- wpclever -- wpc%20frequently%20bought%20together%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WPClever WPC Frequently Bought Together for WooCommerce.This issue affects WPC Frequently Bought Together for WooCommerce: from n/a through 7.0.3.

item.title: CVE-2023-6494|2024-04-13T08:41:15.619Z -- wpclever -- wpc%20smart%20quick%20view%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The WPC Smart Quick View for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via admin settings in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with administrator-level permissions and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page. This only affects multi-site installations and installations where unfiltered_html has been disabled.
